exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap z, t : dart H1 : inv_hmap m H2 : (fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \\/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end) m z /\\ (exists i : nat, Iter (f m) i z = t) Unable to unify "(fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \\/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end) m z /\\ (exists i : nat, Iter (f m) i z = t)" with "exd m t".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> expo m z t -> exd m t

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
expo = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) => exd m z /\ (exists i : nat, Iter (f m) i z = t) : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
dart = nat : Set
expo_expo1 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> expo m z t < -> expo1 m z t
exds_rem_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m t -> ~ exds (Iter_rem m z) t < -> exds (Iter_orb m z) t
ex_i : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m t -> let sr := Iter_rem m z in let nr := Iter_upb m z in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (f m) i z = t}
L2 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 -> ~ exds (Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds x zn0)) t
L3 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0
PL2 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 -> ~ exds (Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds x zn0)) t : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Prop
ex_i_aux : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (s : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds s t -> (card s <= ndN m)%nat -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (f m) i z = t}
PL3 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Prop
P4 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (s : set) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds s t -> (card s <= ndN m)%nat -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (f m) i z = t} : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Set
OMEGA7 : forall x y z t : Z, z > 0 -> t > 0 -> 0 <= x -> 0 <= y -> 0 <= x * z + y * t
expo1 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) => exd m z /\ (let p := Iter_upb m z in exists j : nat, (j < p)%nat /\ Iter (f m) j z = t) : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
exd_diff_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> diff_orb m z
modulo : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), dart -> inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> nat
exd_A_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (A m k z) -> exd m z
exd_cA_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (cA m k z) -> exd m z
exd_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (bottom m k z)
exd_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (top m k z)
exd_cA_1_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (cA_1 m k z) -> exd m z
exd_A_1_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (A_1 m k z) -> exd m z
M.f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> M.f m (M.f_1 m z) = z
f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> M.f m (M.f_1 m z) = z
M.f_1_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> M.f_1 m (M.f m z) = z
f_1_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> M.f_1 m (M.f m z) = z
succ_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> exd m z
pred_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> exd m z
exd_Iter_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (Iter (f m) (Iter_upb m z) z)
exd_not_nil : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> z <> nil
exd_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (M.f m z)
M.exd_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (M.f m z)
exd_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (M.f_1 m z)
M.exd_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (M.f_1 m z)
succ_exd_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> exd m (A m k z)
pred_exd_A_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> exd m (A_1 m k z)
exd_cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (cA m k z) /\ exd m (cA_1 m k z)
cA_1_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA_1 m k z <> nil -> exd m z
cA_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA m k z <> nil -> exd m z
nosucc_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> top m k z = z
nopred_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> bottom m k z = z
cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k (cA_1 m k z) = z
cA_1_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA_1 m k (cA m k z) = z

``` 
intros m z t H1 H2.
unfold expo in H2.
unfold exd in H2.
unfold exd in H1.
destruct H1 as [H1a | H1b].
- apply H2.
- apply H1b.
```

original: intros m z t H1 H2. unfold expo in H2. unfold exd in H2. unfold exd in H1. destruct H1 as [H1a | H1b]. - apply H2. - apply H1b.
